app.name: Eyetv Scraper
app.description: XES (XBMCEyetvScraper), a companion plugin with XEP (XBMCEyetvParser). XES and XEP work with XBMC and Boxee (plex is untested, anyone?). XEP is relatively simple, XES is complex, read the readme. XES attempts to use XBMC/Boxee's library functions by creating a TV Shows directory of symbolic links to your actual Eyetv files, and scrape thetvdb for nfo files, banners, and fanart.
